entries.title: Iran Update, June 24, 2024
entries.description: Hamas is rebuilding its weapons production capacity in the Gaza Strip as part of a larger effort to reconstitute its military forces. An Israeli military correspondent reported on June 24 that Hamas is establishing small weapons manufacturing sites...

entries.title: Russian Offensive Campaign Assessment, June 24, 2024
entries.description: Ukrainian Main Military Intelligence Directorate (GUR) Head Lieutenant General Kyrylo Budanov stated that Western military assistance is arriving in Ukraine, but that it will likely not arrive at a scale that will significantly impact the frontline...

entries.title: Iran Update, June 23, 2024
entries.description: Hamas appears to be accelerating its reconstitution effort in the Gaza Strip. Hamas is actively recruiting 18-year-olds and has attempted to conduct training for new recruits. Recruitment is one element of the second stage of reconstitution,...

entries.title: Russian Offensive Campaign Assessment, June 23, 2024
entries.description: The Islamic State (IS) Northern Caucasus branch, Wilayat Kavkaz, likely conducted a complex and coordinated attack against churches, synagogues, and law enforcement structures in the Republic of Dagestan on June 23. Dagestan's Ministry of...

entries.title: Russian Offensive Campaign Assessment, June 22, 2024
entries.description: Russian forces appear to be intensifying the tempo of their offensive operations in Donetsk Oblast while decreasing the rate of attacks in northern Kharkiv Oblast. US policy continues to prohibit Ukrainian forces from striking legitimate military...

entries.title: Iran Update, June 22, 2024
entries.description: The IDF reportedly attempted to target the fourth highest-ranking Hamas military commander in Gaza City.

entries.title: Russian Offensive Campaign Assessment, June 21, 2024
entries.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin continues to invoke nuclear threats as part of his ongoing information campaign to discourage further Western support for Ukraine and undermine the international community's efforts to cohere its strategic...

entries.title: Iran Update, June 21, 2024
entries.description: Iranian presidential candidates discussed government management and service provision during the second debate for the upcoming election.

entries.title: China-Taiwan Weekly Update, June 21, 2024
entries.description: The PRC hosted the 16th annual Straits Forum to promote stronger cross-strait linkages with the Taiwanese business community, civil society, and opposition political parties.

entries.title: Russian Offensive Campaign Assessment, June 20, 2024
